lyric:
[by:KRees]
[00:14.30]At break of day
[00:16.20]In hope we rise
[00:18.00]We speak your name
[00:19.90]We lift our eyes
[00:21.96]Tune our hearts
[00:23.70]To Your beat
[00:25.60]Where we walk
[00:27.35]There You'll be
[00:29.00]With fire in our eyes
[00:30.99]Our lives, a light
[00:32.73]Your love untamed
[00:34.45]It's blazing out
[00:36.40]The streets will glow
[00:38.15]Forever bright
[00:40.05]Your glory is breaking through the night
[00:43.96]You will never fade away
[00:45.95]Your love is here to stay
[00:47.60]By my side
[00:48.48]In my life
[00:49.43]Shining through me everyday
[00:51.39]You will never fade away
[00:53.42]Your love is here to stay
[00:54.93]By my side
[00:55.80]In my life
[00:56.74]Shining through me everyday!
[00:58.62]
[01:13.15]You wake within me, wake within me
[01:17.15]You're in my heart forever
[01:20.45]You wake within me, wake within me
[01:24.55]You're in my heart forever!
